```{r setup}
library(d6raster)
```

# read a dataframe with four columns

```{r}
table <- readr::read_delim(paste0(getwd(), "/test_data_fisbroker.csv"), delim = ";")
table
```

# run function berlin_wfs

```{r}
berlin_wfs(table = table, Geo_path = ".")
```
